hero.title: Duotopia
hero.subtitle: Multiple Intelligence English Learning Platform
hero.description: Through AI speech recognition and instant feedback, create personalized English speaking learning experiences for students aged 6-15. Let every child speak English with confidence!

features.title: Why Choose Duotopia?
features.subtitle: Combining cutting-edge AI technology with educational psychology to create the best English speaking training platform for Asian students

aiSpeech.title: AI Speech Recognition
aiSpeech.description: Advanced speech recognition technology accurately assesses pronunciation, intonation, and fluency, providing instant feedback and improvement suggestions

multiIntelligence.title: Multiple Intelligence Learning
multiIntelligence.description: Six activity types covering listening, speaking, reading, and writing, from reading aloud to situational dialogues, comprehensively improving English proficiency

analytics.title: Learning Data Analytics
analytics.description: Detailed learning reports and progress tracking, allowing teachers and parents to clearly understand children's learning progress

gamification.title: Gamification Motivation
gamification.description: Gamification elements such as points, badges, and leaderboards increase learning motivation and engagement

security.title: Safe & Secure
security.description: Compliant with COPPA and GDPR regulations, protecting student privacy and giving parents peace of mind

easyToUse.title: Easy to Use
easyToUse.description: Intuitive interface design, teachers can get started in 5 minutes, students require no additional training

howItWorks.title: Three Simple Steps to Start Your Learning Journey
howItWorks.subtitle: From registration to seeing results, as fast as one week

step1.title: Teachers Register and Create Classes
step1.description: Free registration, create classes and invite students to join, the whole process takes less than 5 minutes

step2.title: Assign Homework and Exercises
step2.description: Choose from a rich library of materials or create your own course content, assign to the entire class with one click

step3.title: AI Assessment and Progress Tracking
step3.description: After students complete exercises, they immediately receive AI feedback, and teachers can view detailed learning reports

testimonials.title: Real Feedback from Educational Settings
testimonials.subtitle: See what other teachers and students say

teacher2.quote: The classroom management features are comprehensive, I can clearly see each student's learning progress. Saves a lot of time grading assignments!
teacher2.name: Mr. Lee

parent1.quote: My child proactively practices English every day, seeing their own progress gives them a sense of accomplishment. Thank you Duotopia!
parent1.name: Ms. Chen

section1.title: 1. Service Definition and Scope
section1.item1: 1.1 Duotopia (hereinafter referred to as "the Service") is a language learning platform that provides interactive language learning content and assessment services.
section1.item2: 1.2 The Service supports multiple language learning, including but not limited to English, Chinese and other language learning and practice.
section1.item3: 1.3 Users can engage in language learning, complete assignments, and receive assessments through this platform.
section1.item4: 1.4 Learning content and assessment results are for educational purposes only.

section2.title: 2. User Registration and Account Management
section2.item1: 2.1 Users must provide a valid email address for registration.
section2.item2: 2.2 Users should keep their account password secure and are fully responsible for all activities under their account.
section2.item3: 2.3 If unauthorized use of the account is discovered, the Service should be notified immediately.
section2.item4: 2.4 The Service reserves the right to terminate or suspend accounts that violate the terms at any time.

section3.title: 3. Copyright Notice
section3.item1: 3.1 The learning content provided by the Service is owned by the Company or authorized providers.
section3.item2: 3.2 Users own the copyright to the learning records and assignment content they create.
section3.item3: 3.3 Users authorize the Service to use their created content to provide services and improve the system.
section3.item4: 3.4 Learning content is for personal learning use only and may not be used commercially or distributed without authorization.
section3.item5: 3.5 The Service will properly preserve users' learning records and manage them according to the privacy policy.

section4.title: 4. Service Usage Restrictions
section4.item1: 4.1 Users may not use the Service for any illegal or improper activities.
section4.item2: 4.2 Users may not attempt to damage, interfere with, or gain unauthorized access to the Service system.
section4.item3: 4.3 Users may not upload or share the following content using the Service:

list.item1: Content that infringes on others' copyrights, trademarks, or other intellectual property rights
list.item2: Content that violates laws and regulations
list.item3: Malware, viruses, or other harmful code

section4.item4: 4.4 Each subscription plan has corresponding usage limits, and upgrading the plan is required to exceed the limits.

section5.title: 5. Privacy Protection
section5.item1: 5.1 The Service values user privacy. Please refer to the Privacy Policy for detailed privacy protection measures.
section5.item2: 5.2 The Service uses industry-standard encryption technology to protect user data.
section5.item3: 5.3 Learning records and personal data will be properly managed in accordance with the law.
section5.item4: 5.4 User data is only used to provide services and will not be shared with third parties without consent.

section6.title: 6. Payment and Subscription
section6.item1: 6.1 The Service offers both free and paid subscription plans.
section6.item2: 6.2 The fees, features, and restrictions of paid plans are subject to website announcements.
section6.item3: 6.3 Subscription fees are prepaid and partial refunds are not available.
section6.item4: 6.4 Users can cancel subscriptions at any time, but fees already paid will not be refunded.
section6.item5: 6.5 Users can choose to change plans, with changes taking effect in the next billing cycle.

section7.title: 7. Disclaimer
section7.item1: 7.1 The Service uses AI technology for speech assessment, and the assessment results are for reference only.
section7.item2: 7.2 The Service strives to ensure the quality of learning content but does not guarantee complete accuracy or suitability for all learners.
section7.item3: 7.3 The Service does not guarantee learning outcomes.
section7.item4: 7.4 The Service is not responsible for any losses arising from the use of the Service.
section7.item5: 7.5 The Service may be temporarily interrupted due to system maintenance, upgrades, or force majeure, and will be restored as soon as possible.

section8.title: 8. Terms Modification
section8.item1: 8.1 The Service reserves the right to modify the terms of service at any time.
section8.item2: 8.2 After modification, the terms will be announced on the website, and continued use of the Service is deemed as consent to the modified terms.
section8.item3: 8.3 If you do not agree to the modified terms, you may choose to stop using the Service.

section9.title: 9. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
section9.item1: 9.1 The interpretation and application of these terms shall be governed by the laws of the Republic of China.
section9.item2: 9.2 Any disputes arising from these terms shall be subject to the jurisdiction of the Taipei District Court, Taiwan as the court of first instance.

section10.title: 10. Contact Information
section10.company: Language Expansion Digital Learning Co., Ltd.
section10.contactPrompt: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us through the following:

errors.saveFailed: Save failed, please try again later

errors.emailInUse: Email already in use, please use another email
errors.studentNumberDuplicate: This student number already exists in the classroom, please use another number

steps.title: Import Steps:
steps.step2: Fill in student data (name, classroom, birthdate)

duplicateAction.title: Duplicate Student Handling:
duplicateAction.skip: Skip Duplicates (default) - Keep existing students, skip duplicates
duplicateAction.update: Update Data - Update existing student's birthdate with new data (password will also update if not changed)
duplicateAction.addSuffix: Add Number - Add number suffix to duplicate names (e.g., John-2)

missingClassrooms.title: The following classrooms have not been created yet:
missingClassrooms.instruction: Please create these classrooms in "My Classrooms" page first, then re-upload the file.

nextSteps.title: Next Steps:
nextSteps.step1: Student default password is birthdate (format: YYYYMMDD)
nextSteps.step2: Please remind students to change password after first login
nextSteps.step3: You can view imported students in "My Students" page

errors.invalidFileType: Unsupported file format, please use CSV or Excel file

errors.invalidBirthdate: Invalid birthdate format (please use YYYYMMDD, YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY/MM/DD)
